define: Retrieve key metrics for Open and Targeted campaigns
params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Period Type. Applicable values:
Day
Week
Month
Last7d
Last30d

Note: The start date and end date must align with the Period Type.

","name":"period_type","sample":"Last30d","type":"string","required":"True","key":"ZwfheEN"},{"description":"

The start_date must be:

- Any day in the past three calendar months for \"Day\" period type

- Sunday for \"Week\" period type

- The 1st day of a Month for \"Month\" period type

- The date that is 6 days prior to the latest data date for \"Last7d\" period type

- The date that is 29 days prior to the latest data date for \"Last30d\" period type


Note: The latest data date can be obtained by using \"AmsCampaignAnalyticsMarker\" in the v2.ams.query_ams_dashboard_update_time API.

","name":"start_date","sample":"20250801","type":"string","required":"True","key":"ZwbckPH"},{"description":"

The end_date must be: 

- Equal to start_date for \"Day\" period type

- Saturday for \"Week\" period type

- The last day of a Month for \"Month\" period type. If the selected month is the current month, the end_date should be the latest data date

- The latest data date for \"Last7d\" period type

- The latest data date for \"Last30d\" period type


Note: 

- The end_date must be later than the start_date and earlier than the latest data date

- The latest data date can be obtained by using \"AmsCampaignAnalyticsMarker\" in the v2.ams.query_ams_dashboard_update_time API.

","name":"end_date","sample":"20250831","type":"string","required":"True","key":"WXKWXef"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"error_param","type":"string","required":null,"key":"TTHeYYH"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"Invalid period type","type":"string","required":null,"key":"cxmeYfJ"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"b937c04e554847789cbf3fe33a0ad5f1","type":"string","required":null,"key":"MGWhpTk"},{"description":"","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"KYDjCfx","children":[{"description":"

Performance data of Open Campaign.

","name":"open_campaign_key_metircs","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"AJzftte","children":[{"description":"

Total number of affiliates who drove orders from Open Campaigns.

","name":"affiliates","sample":"34","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"FpsPrw"},{"description":"

Total number of items sold from Open Campaigns.

","name":"items_sold","sample":"44","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"xrThP"},{"description":"

Total value of orders from Open Campaigns.

","name":"sales","sample":"3233454","type":"string","required":null,"key":"WdHKTdC"},{"description":"

Total estimated commission for orders placed from Open Campaigns.

","name":"est_commission","sample":"5675675","type":"string","required":null,"key":"EamJhFG"}]},{"description":"

Performance data of Target Campaign.

","name":"targeted_campaign_key_metircs","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"CApYSaW","children":[{"description":"

Total number of affiliates who drove orders from Targeted Campaigns.

","name":"affiliates","sample":"34","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"iRZjtWy"},{"description":"

Total number of items sold from Targeted Campaigns.

","name":"items_sold","sample":"56","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"wnEpNQa"},{"description":"

Total value of orders from Targeted Campaigns.

","name":"sales","sample":"6767","type":"string","required":null,"key":"yzJFhPF"},{"description":"

Total estimated commission for orders placed from Targeted Campaigns.

","name":"est_commission","sample":"46775","type":"string","required":null,"key":"fSNshCF"}]},{"description":"

Effective query date range. Invalid input ranges will be automatically shifted.

","name":"fetched_date_range","sample":"20250801-20250831","type":"string","required":null,"key":"NeaZWtn"}]}]}
